description.narrative: Funding under this initiative provides electoral assistance in Afghanistan, specifically: Enhancing Legal and Electoral Capacity for Tomorrow Phase II" by the United Nations Development Program (UNDP ELECT II) which is building the capacity of national electoral bodies to hold credible and fair elections; "Afghan Capacity for Media and Elections" by Internews for media strengthening and public awareness raising in support of the objective to increase meaningful participation in democratic institutions and processes; "Public Outreach Democracy and Elections" by The Asia Foundation for public outreach in support of the objective to increase public understanding of the electoral process and voter rights and to inform election-related civic education programs; and Independent monitoring and evaluation of the programs to provide independent analysis and review of the programs. The total value of this initiative is $21.8 million over five years starting 2011-12. "
